task: Develop a basic 'Grim Fandango' game. Modify it by applying the oblique strategy: 'Accept advice'.
name: Guided Spirits

branding_data.short_description: Embark on a mystical journey in the Land of the Dead where accepting advice is key to solving puzzles and uncovering secrets.
branding_data.detailed_description: Guided Spirits is an adventure game inspired by the classic 'Grim Fandango'. Set in a vibrant, afterlife world, players assume the role of a newly arrived soul navigating the Land of the Dead. The game introduces a unique mechanic where accepting advice from other spirits and enigmatic characters is essential to progress. Players must listen carefully to the wisdom and warnings offered by these guides to solve intricate puzzles, unlock hidden pathways, and uncover the mysteries of their past life. The game features a rich narrative filled with humor, intrigue, and emotional depth, all while exploring themes of redemption and self-discovery. The stylized art and atmospheric soundtrack enhance the immersive experience as players interact with a diverse cast of characters, each with their own stories and insights.
